The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

/Users/brackeneddy23/Desktop/Personal Gi.serviceRawFile:
service: platoro-api

# frameworkVersion: '3'

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: python3.11
  region: us-east-1
  environment:
    GOALS_TABLE: goals
    COGNITO_USER_POOL_ID: us-east-1_rg2KJCwn3
    COGNITO_APP_CLIENT_ID: 1ld5rfsnbldiccjtpk6gmvtv9d
    COGNITO_APP_CLIENT_SECRET: 16idfdj1gq3mfl8accoqrhr3hvoita41buhrll0inn0bf52tv6qf
  iam:
    role:
      statements:
        - Effect: "Allow"
          Action:
            - "dynamodb:PutItem"
            - "dynamodb:GetItem"
            - "dynamodb:Query"
            - "dynamodb:DeleteItem"
            - "dynamodb:UpdateItem"
          Resource:
            - arn:aws:dynamodb:us-east-1:620214273874:table/goals

functions:
  createGoal:
    handler: src/handlers/goals/create_goal.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: goal
          method: post
  getGoal:
    handler: src/handlers/goals/get_goal.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: goal
          method: get
          cors: true
  updateGoalProgress:
    handler: src/handlers/goals/update_goal_progress.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: goal-progress
          method: post
          cors: true
  deleteGoal:
    handler: src/handlers/goals/delete_goal.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: goal
          method: delete
          cors: true
  getSummary:
    handler: src/handlers/goals/get_summary.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: summary
          method: get
          cors: true
  createAccount:
    handler: src/handlers/accounts/create_account.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: account/signup
          method: post
          cors: true
  loginAccount:
    handler: src/handlers/accounts/login_account.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: account/login
          method: post
          cors: true
  requestPasswordReset:
    handler: src/handlers/accounts/request_password_reset.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: account/request-reset
          method: post
          cors: true
  confirmPasswordReset:
    handler: src/handlers/accounts/confirm_password_reset.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: account/confirm-reset
          method: post
          cors: true
  confirmSignup:
    handler: src/handlers/accounts/confirm_signup.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: account/confirm
          method: post
          cors: true





plugins:
  - serverless-python-requirements

custom:
  pythonRequirements:
    dockerizePip: true
